name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary: Senior Web Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications, specializing in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **HTML5**, and **CSS3**. Proficient in modern web development frameworks and tools such as **Node.js**, **Gulp**, **Webpack**, and experienced in Behavior-Driven Development with **Playwright**. Extensive knowledge of frontend technologies and a strong foundation in backend development. Proven track record in building AI/ML-powered platforms that leverage automation and real-time processing, with expertise in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**. Adept at implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines while ensuring compliance with standards like HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in MLOps, encompassing model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.
